search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for WeTravel (wetravel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for WeTravel can be found at: [https://www.wetravel.com/features/pricing](https://www.wetravel.com/features/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: WeTravel Pricing - Payment Processing For Travel Industry

extracted_content.content:
WeTravel Pricing - Payment Processing For Travel Industry =============== This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy. If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked. AcceptDecline [](https://wetravel.com/)[![Image 14: wetravel logo.png](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/Imported%20images/wetravel%20logo.png%3Fwidth=340%26height=84%26name=wetravel%20logo.png)](https://wetravel.com/) * OPERATIONS TYPE * [Adventure Travel](https://product.wetravel.com/adventure-tour-booking-software?hsLang=en) * [Group Travel](https://product.wetravel.com/group-travel-businesses?hsLang=en) * [Wellness Retreats](https://product.wetravel.com/wellness-retreat-management-software?hsLang=en) * [Custom Travel](https://product.wetravel.com/custom-luxury-travel-businesses?hsLang=en) * [Travel Agencies](https://product.wetravel.com/travel-agency-software?hsLang=en) * PRODUCT * [How It Works](https://help.wetravel.com/en/articles/253921-how-it-works) * [Payment Processing](https://product.wetravel.com/pricing) * [Booking Management](https://product.wetravel.com/bookings?hsLang=en) * [Inventory Management](https://product.wetravel.com/inventory-management?hsLang=en) * [Multi-Currency Checkout](https://product.wetravel.com/payment-flexibility-travel-industry?hsLang=en) * [WeTravel Card](https://product.wetravel.com/wetravel-card?hsLang=en) * [Supplier Transfers](https://product.wetravel.com/supplier-transfers-wetravel?hsLang=en) * PRICING * [Free & Paid Plans](https://www.wetravel.com/plans) * [Processing Fees](https://product.wetravel.com/pricing) * ACADEMY * [Product Development](https://academy.wetravel.com/multi-day-travel-product-development?hsLang=en) * [Women+ in Travel](https://academy.wetravel.com/women-in-travel?hsLang=en) * [Sustainable Travel](https://academy.wetravel.com/sustainable-multi-day-tours?hsLang=en) * [Adventure Travel](https://academy.wetravel.com/adventure-travel?hsLang=en) * [Wellness Retreats](https://academy.wetravel.com/wellness-travel?hsLang=en) * [Travel Advisors & Agencies](https://academy.wetravel.com/travel-agencies?hsLang=en) * [Educational Travel](https://academy.wetravel.com/student-group?hsLang=en) * [Travel Trends](https://academy.wetravel.com/travel-trends?hsLang=en) [Book a Demo](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_header&hsLang=en) [Sign In](https://www.wetravel.com/users/sign_in) Reduce fees. Grow revenue. All-in-one payment processing for the travel industry ================================================================================ Accept international payments, processed at local rates. With WeTravel’s automated and secure payments, you and your travelers save on fees. [BOOK A DEMO](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) 4.8 ![Image 15: wetravel-capterra-reviews-1](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/wetravel-capterra-reviews-1.png) based on 400+ Capterra reviews ![Image 16: mcc-no-fees](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/mcc-no-fees-01-1.png) ![Image 17: New-Icons-growth](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/New-Icons-growth.png) ### Grow Revenue Allow your customers to pay seamlessly in their currency and local payment method, increasing your revenue effortlessly. ![Image 18: New-Icons-money](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/New-Icons-money.png) ### Reduce Fees With fee-free payments and industry-low fees, say goodbye to hidden costs and foreign exchange fees. ![Image 19: New-Icons-time](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/New-Icons-time.png) ### Impress customers Surpass your customers’ expectations by offering unrivaled flexibility and the payment methods they know and trust. Price trips in your currency, let customers pay in theirs --------------------------------------------------------- Select where your customers book from, and gain clarity on available payment methods and fees USA 🇺🇸Europe (EEA) 🇪🇺UK 🇬🇧Canada 🇨🇦Australia 🇦🇺Mexico 🇲🇽Switzerland🇨🇭Sweden 🇸🇪Denmark 🇩🇰Poland 🇵🇱Norway 🇳🇴New Zealand 🇳🇿Hong Kong 🇭🇰Rest of the world 🌎 * USA 🇺🇸 * Europe (EEA) 🇪🇺 * UK 🇬🇧 * Canada 🇨🇦 * Australia 🇦🇺 * Mexico 🇲🇽 * Switzerland🇨🇭 * Sweden 🇸🇪 * Denmark 🇩🇰 * Poland 🇵🇱 * Norway 🇳🇴 * New Zealand 🇳🇿 * Hong Kong 🇭🇰 * Rest of the world 🌎 X Clear Selection Apply Filters

[Learn more.](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?hsLang=en)_ [BOOK A DEMO](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) **Grow globally, pay locally** ------------------------------ Minimize fees by enabling customers to choose local, fee-free payment methods at checkout. ![Image 33: New-Icons-price-tag](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/New-Icons-price-tag.png) **Price your trips ** Expand your market reach and price trips in 34 currencies including USD, CAD, EUR, GBP, and AUD, for unmatched flexibility, transparency and convenience for your customers. ![Image 34: New-Icons-money-bill](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/New-Icons-money-bill.png) **Offer local payment methods ** Allow customers to use one of five [local, fee-free payment methods](https://product.wetravel.com/payment-flexibility-travel-industry?hsLang=en)—such as ACH in the US and SEPA in Europe—while you receive funds in your currency with no processing fees. ![Image 35: New-Icons-screen-money](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/New-Icons-screen-money.png) **Save processing fees ** Offer card payments at industry-low rates, with options for you or your customers to cover the fees—transparent throughout the booking process. ![Image 36: New-Icons-card-b](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/New-Icons-card-b.png) **Smooth checkout experience ** At checkout, the customer’s local payment method will always be automatically selected, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free experience.  [START TODAY](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) **See how it works in just 90 seconds** --------------------------------------- **CASE STUDY** **Hear from Girls Trip Tours on how WeTravel boosted their profits** Girls Trip is an African-owned and run business focused on empowering women through travel. The business uses WeTravel to manage their booking process, from integrated checkout to back-end booking management and traveler communication. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [LEARN MORE](https://academy.wetravel.com/customer-success-story-girstriptours?hsLang=en) **One platform. An end-to-end solution** for all of your travel payment processing needs. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- MANAGE BOOKINGS COLLECT PAYMENTS STREAMLINE OPERATIONS GROW YOUR BUSINESS ### Manage bookings efficiently Create reports and edit bookings effortlessly. Collect customer information with customizable questionnaires. Easy to upload documents and collect eSignatures. Stress-free modifications and customer messaging all in one place. Fully automate emails to all (or a sub-set) of your trip participants with powerful scheduling options. ### Automatically collect payments Offer payment options like card, bank transfer 24/7, and local payment methods. Passengers can pay from any device, in multiple currencies. Manage cash flow and accounts receivable. No more chasing invoices! Upgrade bookings at any time with optional add-ons. Create bookable trip page in minutes and increase conversions, no matter if it is for an individual invoice or a group trip. ### Simplify your business processes Communicate with your customers with ease. Generate internal reports to help resource management. Automate post-trip review collection. Access your funds easily and convert to your home currency. Pay any suppliers, vendors, or partners at no charge. ### Reach new global markets Connect with suppliers and create opportunities in new markets. Expand your customer base by selling to new geographies. Boost conversions with our marketing and lead capture tools. In-platform transfers and global payout options. [SEE WETRAVEL IN ACTION](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) Used by thousands of group and multi-day travel businesses, like yours ![Image 37: wetravel-businesses-who-work-with-us-1-1](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/wetravel-businesses-who-work-with-us-1-1.png) And trusted by industry-leading associations ![Image 38: logos-h-gray-25](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/logos-h-gray-25.png) ![Image 39: badges-gray](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/badges-gray.png) Free resources to continue your professional development outside of WeTravel's platform --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Get started today in WeTravel's Academy with expert-crafted resources on travel payment best practices. [![Image 40: articles-pics-bookingandpayments](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/articles-pics-bookingandpayments.png)](https://academy.wetravel.com/bookings-and-payments?hsLang=en) **ARTICLE** #### [How To Create A Seamless Travel Booking and Payments Process](https://academy.wetravel.com/bookings-and-payments?hsLang=en) [![Image 41: articles-pics-paymentgateway](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/articles-pics-paymentgateway.png)](https://academy.wetravel.com/payment-gateway-travel-industry?hsLang=en) **ARTICLE** #### [How to Choose a Payment Gateway in the Travel Industry](https://academy.wetravel.com/payment-gateway-travel-industry?hsLang=en) [![Image 42: articles-pics-wtpayment](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/articles-pics-wtpayment.png)](https://academy.wetravel.com/wetravels-payment-platform-pricing?hsLang=en) **ARTICLE** #### [What You Need to Know About WeTravel's Payment Platform Pricing](https://academy.wetravel.com/wetravels-payment-platform-pricing?hsLang=en) ![Image 43: tablet-sumit-replay](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/tablet-sumit-replay-1.png) ![Image 44: wt-trends-01](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/wt-trends-01.png) ![Image 45: Travel_Innovation_Summit-bold-08](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Travel_Innovation_Summit-bold-08.png) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- **Hear from the Experts: Payment Strategies That Work** ------------------------------------------------------- Watch the panel discussion about how evolving **payment trends** can transform your business. [WATCH NOW](https://academy.wetravel.com/event-replay-untangling-payment-choices-check-card-or-digital-wallet?hs_preview=VbJmAWNf-181018368037&hsLang=en) ### Follow us on social [![Image 46: Social-trends-01](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Social-trends-01.png)](https://www.facebook.com/wetravel.to)[![Image 47: Social-trends-04](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Social-trends-04.png)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/wetravel/) [![Image 48: Social-trends-03](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Social-trends-03.png)](https://www.instagram.com/wetravel.to/)  [![Image 49: Social-trends-02](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Social-trends-02.png)](https://www.threads.net/@wetravel.to) ### Frequently asked questions #### What is Multi-Currency Checkout? Multi-Currency Checkout allows your customers to pay using their local payment methods at local rates. As the trip organizer, you will see all payments in the trip currency. For example, if your customers want to pay in EUR for a USD trip, for the customer we will show the amount due in checkout in EUR using market-leading exchange rates. You will receive the payment in USD. This feature reduces payment fees for both you and your customers. Learn more about how it works [here.](https://product.wetravel.com/payment-flexibility-travel-industry?hsLang=en) #### Can I accept cash payments? Yes, you can record cash or check payments with no transaction fees. You can choose whether to send a booking confirmation email to your client. #### Can I issue refunds to my clients? Yes, click [here](https://help.wetravel.com/en/articles/417403-how-do-i-issue-a-partial-or-full-refund-to-a-participant) to learn more about issuing partial or full refunds to your participants. #### Can I pass on fees to participants? When creating a trip, you can choose to absorb the credit card fees or pass them on to your participants. Participants will cover the fee if they pay with Visa or Mastercard; they can also choose fee-free bank transfer. Similarly, you can pass the WeTravel fee to participants. Learn more about how fees work for your participants by [booking a demo.](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) #### How much does it cost to transfer funds to my bank account? Transfers from your WeTravel balance to your bank account or your suppliers’ bank accounts are free and arrive in seconds. Learn how it works and the differences with other providers [here.](https://product.wetravel.com/supplier-transfers-wetravel?hsLang=en) #### Do you offer any discounts or special pricing for non-profits? Yes, we do! Certified US 501(c)(3) and 501(c)(7) organizations, European non-profits, and student-led trips can get preferential rates and pricing. [Contact our team](mailto:info@wetravel.com) to apply for it. #### Do you have a free trial? It's totally free to create an account and start accepting payments! Only transaction fees will apply. You can upgrade to the Pro plan with a 30-day money-back guarantee for just $79/month to access enhanced lead capture, customization, and smart booking features. [Learn more](https://www.wetravel.com/pricing) about Pro features. #### What other benefits are there in using WeTravel? WeTravel is a platform tailored for multi-day travel organizers to cover all your needs throughout your customers' journey, saving you time and money. Acquire more clients with a booking button, contact form, brochures, and itineraries. Manage bookings and payments, keep track of operations, and more! [Schedule a demo](https://product.wetravel.com/request-a-demo?utm_content=lp_pricing&hsLang=en) to learn how WeTravel can help your business become more efficient and grow. #### Is WeTravel right for all tour operators, no matter the size? WeTravel is designed for tour operators of all sizes. It offers scalable solutions for individual travel organizers, small businesses, and large enterprises. The platform's features, like booking management tools, customer portals, and multi-currency payment options, are versatile enough to meet the needs of both small and large operations, making it a valuable tool for any tour operator looking to streamline their processes and enhance customer experience. #### How long does it take to integrate WeTravel into my website? Integrating WeTravel into your website is quick and easy. Create your free account and complete the standard verification process in just minutes. Then, you're ready to set up your first trip! You can easily integrate widgets like the "Book Now" button, contact form, or brochure download by copying and pasting a piece of code onto your website. #### How do travel agents process payments with WeTravel? Travel agents and advisors accept client payments into their WeTravel account. From their WeTravel account, agents can freely and instantly transfer funds to an agency account, suppliers or operators – using WeTravel’s [supplier transfer feature](https://product.wetravel.com/supplier-transfers-wetravel?hsLang=en). * [About WeTravel](javascript:;) * [About Us](https://product.wetravel.com/about-us) * X_logo_2023_(white)](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/X_logo_2023_(white).png)](https://twitter.com/wetravel) * [![Image 52: youtube](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/WeTravelAcadmey_March2023/images/youtube.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvULljlXas1iQ2WSjFGwPVA) * [![Image 53: instagram](https://product.wetravel.com/hubfs/WeTravelAcadmey_March2023/images/instagram.svg)](https://www.instagram.com/wetravel.to/) * [![Image 54: linkedin-white](https://product.wetravel.com/hs-fs/hubfs/linkedin-white.png)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/wetravel) We value your privacy --------------------- By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our[Privacy Policy](https://www.wetravel.com/privacy) Accept All Cookies Preferences ![Image 55: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/4125c8ec-739f-4970-bf02-f9ba7d9fb35f/f5d0c9a2-a5c7-490d-bea4-32366acc12e7/1ac7d20b-e180-4bdc-a981-87093121c103/WeTravelLogo2_1.png) Your Opt Out Preference Signal is Honored Preference center ----------------- When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [More information](https://www.wetravel.com/privacy) Allow All ### Manage Consent Preferences #### Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. Cookies Details‎ #### Targeting Cookies Targeting Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. Cookies Details‎ #### Performance Cookies Performance Cookies These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. Cookies Details‎ #### Functional Cookies Functional Cookies These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. Cookies Details‎ ### Cookie List Clear checkbox label label Apply Cancel Consent Leg.Interest checkbox label label checkbox label label checkbox label label Reject All Confirm My Choices [![Image 56: Powered by Onetrust](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/powered_by_logo.svg)](https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/) WeTravel is a payment processing platform that helps travel businesses accept payments from travelers around the world with a variety of payment options.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on transaction fees for payment processing, varying by region and payment method.
